description:
Senpai and Nagatoro get caught in the rain. She invites him over to wait for the rain to pass. Senpai sits with Nagatoro and her friends for lunch, and things get awkward.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Lass uns das noch mal machen, Senpai! / Senpai, hier spielt die Musik!
Let`s Play Again, Senpai / Over Here, Senpai!
Mata Yarimashou ne, Senpai! / Senpaai, Kocchi Kocchii
On rejouera, hein ? / Viens t`asseoir ici !
またやりましょうね, センパイっ / センパーイ, こっちこっち~
